sentence.Network_en: The process comprises first oligomerizing isobutylene to diisobutylene using a sulfonic acid type ion exchange resin.
sentence.Network_cn: 所述的方法包括首先异丁烯用磺酸型离子交换树脂低聚生成二聚异丁烯.

sentence.Network_en: Ionic polymerization of isobutylene was carried out by using F - K acid as a catalyst.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用络合F -K 酸作引发剂进行异丁烯阳离子聚合.
